modName: Voice of the Emperor Power - Volume Normalized
descriptionHtml:
[color=GreenYellow]Voice of the Emperor Power - Volume Normalized[/color]

Author:
haldir307

Description:
Replaces the overvolumed sound of the power "Voice of the Emperor" with a normalized one.
The normal level of volume is 85%, every sound of powers are 85%, the vanilla level sound of the power "Voice of the Emperor" in skyrim was like 115%, in gameplay it was too loud for me so i reduced it's volume and made it replacable for those who have the same problem. ;)

Here is a video sample:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyKzuXi4ZXc&feature=youtu.be

Installation:
Extract the file and copy the folder "sounds" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData

Permissions:
1) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my files to other sites!
2) Users/Modders are not allowed to convert my file so that it works on similar games!
3) Users/Modders are not allowed to modify my file including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game and upload it as a seperate file!
4) Users/Modders are not allowed to use assets contained in my files in their own files!
[b][i]5) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â [/i][/b]
[b][i][u]6) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money and it means the same for Permissions 2/3/4, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b]

Credits:
Made by haldir307.
